channel.title: Making a clan
channel.description:
Hey I'm making a clan for RuneScape it's a member/non-member PKing clan. It's really new and I made the forum a few days ago and I need at least 20 people to join.
This is the URL [url=http://s4.invisionfree.com/operationgaming]s4.invisionfree.com/operationgaming[/url]. You can find the application thread on login so it's easy as using the layout I supplied. I also made a forum for general stuff so you guys don't get bored.
Mods lock this if it's against the rules because as far as I know (I didn't read the threads rules) it shouldn't be a problem.
I will be on the forum daily looking at the applications.
Thanks Inching Away (Forum S/N is Ninjaman257).

item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:

This is the URL s4.invisionfree.com/operationgaming.

Look at the URL please?

item.title: Making a clan
item.dc:creator: @linkinxxpark linkinxxpark
item.description:
@linkinxxpark wrote:

hey if you want more people go to invisionfree or invision free something like that anyways go there and make a website then you’ll already have a clan without even saying making a clan (made no sense maybe) but do that much faster then posting it on here

Read full topic
